name: St Vincent de Paul Society
description: Helping those in need in our local community through practical support and friendship.
meetingTime: First Thursday of each month, 7:30 PM

name: Legion of Mary
description: Marian devotion and apostolic work in the spirit of Mary, Mother of God.

name: Children's Liturgy
description: Age-appropriate liturgy for children during Sunday 10:00 AM Mass.

name: Flower Arranging Group
description: Beautifying our church with fresh flowers for liturgical celebrations.

name: Parish Choir
description: Leading the congregation in sung worship at Sunday and special Masses.
note: All voices welcome - no audition required
